attributes.action: Force the government to hold a FULL NATIONAL inquiry into UK grooming gangs.
attributes.background: The government is ignoring the publics interest in holding a FULL COMPREHENSIVE PUBLIC INQUIRY, this is NOT acceptable and we the public demand one. WE MUST hold all those complicit accountable.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
